| History                 = The White Dragon Clan were a [[London (England)|London]]-based criminal clan. Who were involved in London's rackets, including prostitution. It's soldiers were trained in martial arts, using Fut Ga techniques which were direct and brutal attacks. When [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]] went to [[White Dragon (Chinatown) (Earth-616)|White Dragon]]'s Club, they fought him and then fought both the [[Sons of the Tiger (Earth-616)|Sons of the Tiger]] and the [[Daughters of the Dragon (Earth-616)|Daughters of the Dragon]].{{r|Deadly Hands of Kung Fu Vol 2 2|3}}
